attributes.action: donate the sum of five million pounds sterling from the National Lottery to Headley Court Rehabilitation Centre in Surrey.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Headley Court Rehabilitation Centre in Surrey is one of the few military establishments available for the treatment and rehabilitation of servicemen and women injured during their service, both on and off active service. They need more funds to enable them to build a swimming pool so that service personnel are no longer subjected to abuse when visiting the council run facility in Leatherhead.
